Yes, it works with FLT release. That is clearly stated in the information you clearly did not read.

I am saddened to see Skidrow dissing FLT for their crack method. They rushed to be first and may well have missed a few things. That happens often in the scene.

To those in the scene: Remember you are allies even as you compete. Have respect for those who are doing the same things. They will make mistakes from time to time. And that is a prime opportunity to help them. Your example is helpful. 

FLT was first, and deserves some credit for it. But Skidrow wins in the end because their crack is working better.

Remember to reserve some money to buy the game if you find it to be good. Otherwise there is no motive to make more games for you to steal and play and enjoy.

I found a solution to the memory leak of Prototype 2 !! if you have ATI Radeon graphic card download a software called Ati Tray tools install it then go to the 3D category you should find "Flip Queue Size" and set it to 1, if you have Nvidia then simply go to the control panel look for "Pre Rendered Frames" and set it to 1 !! i tried it and it works fine now exept for some loss of FPS but the game is still playable
CAREFULL : this is the crack only
